participant_1.background:
I spent time with my friends and family and tried to forget about my parents.
I work out at home so I can listen to my favorite music while I get in shape.
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.
I have a strange sense of humor, but my mom is my favorite person.
i love to ski in the winter.

participant_2.background:
I love my Acara, it's round and comfortable.
after finishing my career i discovered that i am not that passionate about it.
I'm not that much into music, but I like to go to concerts with my boss.
my name is nancy.
I have a collection of larp weapons and armor.

content.text: Hello!  How was your day today?
Hi! It was good. How about yours?
Pretty good! I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set. It was a lot of fun.
That sounds really fun. I love train sets! I have a collection of larp weapons and armor.
That is really cool! I've never heard of larp weapons and armor before.
It's a live action role playing game. You pretend to be a character in a fantasy world and use weapons and armor to fight your opponents.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to try something like that.
It's definitely a lot of fun! You should try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What did you do for your career?
I worked as a teacher for a few years, but I recently quit because I realized I wasn't passionate about it.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. What are you going to do now?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going back to school or starting my own business.
That sounds like a good idea. I'm sure you'll figure it out.
